document.full_text: in today's 18 and under column, pediatrician dr. perri klass writes about the declining popularity of tonsillectomies, which were once almost routine in pediatrics.
document.title: taking out tonsils less often
lines_and_colors: in today's 18 and under column, pediatrician dr. perri klass writes about the declining popularity of tonsillectomies, which were once almost routine in pediatrics.
